topic.title: Do I need to open port 15441 to be able to seed?
topic.body:
For some reason, I can't open port 15441 (or any port, for that matter) due to either my router being horrible or my ISP being a dick. If I can't seed anything without opening port 15441, I might as well get a VPS and run a proxy there. 

If anyone can answer my question, I'd appreciate that.

1512651955_1GSZKHqdkmnBZHy1FUXbq2PQT4hHD.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_56_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): You don't have to open it. For sharing, ZeroNet has two possibilities: [...]

I mean, seeding sites (that I do not own). Basically, I want to support the network.
